data.description:
Fingerball is the next evolution in immersive XR gaming, where your hands become the ultimate controllers. Whether you're playing in your living room with passthrough mode or stepping into one of our meticulously designed virtual environments, Fingerball delivers a unique blend of reality and fantasy, all within your grasp. See our roadmap down below for planned development depending on how much our players love playing the game!

![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75196219_384403851095797_2033514409801641889_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=YhOvQfkxkVkQ7kNvgHL1bsj&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBmBwcGQG_1NqUw3fQ8pk3RqQhAUTAdhS3Ff9zao2vr2w&oe=66EEB18A)

Thanks to cutting-edge hand tracking technology, Fingerball brings precision and fluidity to your gameplay like never before. Just a touch from your hands sends the ball flying, and every movement is perfectly captured, making each play feel natural and intuitive. Whether you’re aiming for the goal or navigating challenges, every action is under your control, demanding a blend of skill, strategy, and finesse.

Dive into fast-paced matches that test your reflexes, or take on challenges that push your skills to the limit. With various modes and difficulty levels, Fingerball is accessible to players of all skill levels, yet offers a depth that will keep even the most seasoned gamers coming back for more.

Easy to learn but hard to master, Fingerball is more than just a game—it's a test of agility, precision, and strategy. Are you ready to put your hands to the ultimate test? Step into Fingerball and find out!
